name: Mint Julep (Southern Style)
instructions: In silver mug or collins glass, dissolve powdered sugar with water. Fill with finely shaved ice and add bourbon. Stir until glass is heavily frosted, adding more ice if necessary. (Do not hold glass with hand while stirring.) Decorate with sprigs of  mint so that the tops are about two inches above the rim of glass. Use short straws so that it will be necessary to bury nose in mint, which is intended for scent rather than taste.
ingredients: springs mint,  Powdered Sugar,  Water,  Bourbon
measurements: 5 or 6 springs mint, 1 oz  Powdered Sugar, 2 oz  Water, 2 1/2 oz  Bourbon

name: Glogg
instructions: Pour the wine into a kettle. Insert cheesecloth bag containing remaining ingredients and boil slowly for 15 minutes, stirring occasionally. Add 1 lb. each blanched almonds and seedless raisins and continue to boil for additional 15 minutes. Remove kettle from stove and place wire grill containing 1 lb. lump sugar over opening. Pour one 750-ml Brandy over sugar, making sure to saturate all of it. Then light sugar with match and let it flame. After sugar has melted, replace kettle cover to extinguish flame. Stir again and remove spice bag. Serve hot in punch cups with a few almonds and raisins.
ingredients: Wine,  Dried Orange Peel,  Cinnamon sticks, cloves
measurements: 2 750-ml  Wine (Port, Cream Sherry, Claret, Burgundy, or Madeira), 2 oz  Dried Orange Peel, 2 oz  Cinnamon sticks, 20 Cardamom Seeds , 25 cloves

name: Wallis Blue Cocktail
instructions: Rim old-fashioned glass with lime and sugar. Fill with ice. Shake remaining ingredients with ice and strain into glass.
ingredients: Lime wedge, superfine sugar,  Gin,  Triple Sec,  Lemon juice
measurements: 1 Lime wedge, superfine sugar, 1 oz  Gin, 1 oz  Triple Sec, 1 oz  Lemon juice

name: Minnehaha Cocktail
instructions: Shake well with cracked ice and strain into 4 oz. cocktail glass.
ingredients: Orange Juice,  Dry Vermouth,  Sweet Vermouth,  Old Mr. Boston Dry Gin
measurements: 1/4 oz  Orange Juice, 1/2 oz  Dry Vermouth, 1/2 oz  Sweet Vermouth, 1 oz  Old Mr. Boston Dry Gin

name: Wallick Cocktail
instructions: Stir with ice and strain into chilled cocktail glass.
ingredients: Gin,  Dry Vermouth,  Triple Sec
measurements: 1 1/2 oz  Gin, 1 1/2 oz  Dry Vermouth, 1 oz  Triple Sec

name: Waikiki Beachcomber
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into chilled cocktail glass.
ingredients: Gin,  Triple Sec,  Pineapple Juice
measurements: 3/4 oz  Gin, 3/4 oz  Triple Sec, 1/2 oz  Pineapple Juice

name: Vow Of Silence
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into chilled cocktail glass.
ingredients: Gin,  Grapefruit Juice,  Lemon juice,  Yellow Chartreuse,  Amaro,  Simple Syrup
measurements: 1 1/2 oz  Gin, 3/4 oz  Grapefruit Juice, 1/2 oz  Lemon juice, 1/2 oz  Yellow Chartreuse, 1/4 oz  Amaro, 1/4 oz  Simple Syrup
